name: Le Malin
acquisitionMethod: Event: Iris of Light and Dark, 小型艦建造

1.name: Poisonous Sting
1.description: When main guns hits the same enemy 10 times, increase the damage it receives from destroyer torpedoes by 4.5%(12%) for 5s. When destroying an enemy ship, increase own Firepower by 0.5%(2%), stacks up to 10 times.

2.name: Vichya's Vindictive Blade
2.description: When battles starts, increase own Evasion and Torpedo by 5%(20%). 30s after battles starts, this bonus fades over the next 20s

3.name: All Out Assault Ⅰ
3.description: Activates All Out Assault Ⅰ: Le Fantasque Class once every 15 times the Main Guns are fired.

2.name: Sleepy Sunday
2.description: Morning, Commander~ Mm, the Sabbath is the day of rest, so I shall not budge from my sacred charge even if you were to call Triomphant over. I solemnly swear to do absolutely nothing today.

3.name: Mercredi at the Secret Base
3.description: I must commend you for being able to find my secret base, Commander... but unfortunately for you, I refuse to return to the office today. Just... *yawn*...let me spend the whole day sleeping here...

limitBreak.tier1: Unlock EX Barrage Ⅰ/Main gun efficiency +5%

1.chinese: 维希教廷空想级驱逐舰—恶毒
1.chineseTL: Vichya Dominion Le Fantasque class Destroyer — Le Malin
1.japanese: ル・ファンタスク級駆逐艦ル・マラン

2.chinese: 我是隶属于维希教廷的空想级驱逐舰恶毒，曾部署于布雷斯特的第八分队…与姐妹们共同作战。但是在那之后，凯旋她选择了和我们不一样的道路……嗯，不用勉强
2.chineseTL: I'm Vichya dominion's Le Fantasque class destroyer, Le Malin. Originally assigned to 8th scout division deployed at brest, I fought together with my sisters.. but after that, Triomphant and I chose a different path... Ah well. there's no need press.
2.japanese: ヴィシア聖座所属。ル・ファンタスク級駆逐艦、ル・マラン。かつてはブレストの第八分隊に所属し、同型艦と一緒に戦っていました。その後、トリオンファンは私達とは異なる道を歩みましたが…えぇ、お互い無理しないことですね
2.english: I am Le Malin, Le Fantasque-class destroyer of the Vichya Dominion. I once fought alongside my friends of the 8th Light Division in Brest. After that, Le Triomphant went down a different path... Well, we don't hold it against each other.

3.chinese: 吾乃逐浪之空想，守护教廷的恶毒之刃——超级驱逐舰“恶毒”，听候差遣
3.chineseTL: The guardian blade that protects the Vichya Dominion, —— super destroyer Le Malin, awaiting your orders.
3.japanese: 我は浪を駆ける空想、「エレガント」なるヴィシアの邪しき剣――駆逐艦ル・マラン、そなたの命に従うしもべとならん
3.english: I am the mirage that chases the waves, the poisoned blade that protects the Vichya Dominion. Super Destroyer, Le Malin, is yours to command.

4.chinese: 驱逐舰恶毒，随时听候差遣。——哈啊…困了…
4.chineseTL: Destroyer Le Malin, awaiting your orders. —— Yawn... sleepy...
4.japanese: 駆逐艦ル・マラン。いつでもご命令を……はああ……
4.english: Destroyer, Le Malin, is ready to take your orders at any time... *yaawnn*...

5.chinese: 哈啊…好困…好想在床上滚来滚去……Zzzzz……额！？有、有什么事吗！？
5.chineseTL: Yawn.... So sleepy.... I just want to roll around in bed... Zzzzz.... Eh!? I-Is there a problem?
5.japanese: はあ……眠い……ベッドでゴロゴロしたい……Zzzzz……！？な、なんですか！？
5.english: *Yawn*... Sleepy... I wanna go roll around in bed... Zzzzz... Geh?! Wh-what is it?!

6.chinese: 徒有速度，缺乏火力，是打败不了敌人的。
6.chineseTL: You can't beat the enemy with all speed and no firepower.
6.japanese: 速さがあっても、火力がなければ敵は倒せません。当然です
6.english: Without firepower, speed alone is not enough to defeat the enemy. That goes without saying.

7.chinese: 好累啊……秘书舰什么的……啊！没什么！
7.chineseTL: So exhausted...  what even is a secretary ship.... Zzzz..... Ah! It's nothing!
7.japanese: だるい……秘書艦やめ……はっ！なんでもありません！
7.english: So bored... maybe it's time to quit... Gah! I didn't say anything!

8.chinese: 敦刻尔克小姐做的点心……呼呼呼……不对不对！现在还是工作时间啊！
8.chineseTL: Miss Dunkerque's sweets.. huhuhu... no, no! I'm supposed to be working!
8.japanese: ダンケルクさんの手作りお菓子……ぐへへへ……いかんいかん！まだ勤務時間中だぞ…！
8.english: Dunkerque's handmade sweets... Guhehe... Ah, I mustn't! I'm still at work...!

9.chinese: 优雅什么的…太累人了……哇！？有、有什么吩咐吗！
9.chineseTL: Elegance, huh... it's so exhausting... Wah!? D-do you have any orders?
9.japanese: エレガントは…疲れるよね……！？な、なにか御用でしょうか！
9.english: Being elegant... isn't worth the effort... Geh?! Wh-what do you want?!

10.japanese: ひゃぅ！？な、何をするんですか！

11.japanese: 新しい指示です。指揮官

12.chinese: 指挥官，上面的奖励发下来了。
12.chineseTL: Commander, the higher ups have issued rewards.
12.japanese: 指揮官、上からの褒賞です

13.chineseTL: There's mail for you.. Are there any for me?
13.japanese: 指揮官への手紙です。……私への手紙はないですか？
13.english: This letter's for you, Commander... Is there nothing for me?

14.chinese: 照着凯旋教的泡了一杯红茶……暴露了吗。没错，就是个茶包而已。你喝就好。
14.chineseTL: I followed Triomphant's instructions and brewed red tea... did I get caught? Oh well. That's right, it's just a teabag. But it's drinkable.
14.japanese: トリオンファンに教えてもらった紅茶です。……バレましたか。ええ、ただのティーパックです。飲めば？
14.english: I steeped this tea just the way Triomphant taught me. ...So you knew, huh? Indeed, it's just a normal cup of tea. Please enjoy it.

15.chinese: 大家都回来了。赶快去港口看看吧
15.chineseTL: Everyone's back. Let's watch the docks.
15.japanese: みんなが帰ってきました。早く出迎えに行きましょう
15.english: The others have returned. Let's hurry and greet them.

16.japanese: 頑張らなくてはなりませんね
16.japaneseTL: I have to work my harndest now, ain't I.
16.english: It wouldn't be right if I didn't work even harder.

17.chinese: 维希教廷的守护之刃，前进！
17.chineseTL: Guardian blade of the Vichya Dominion, forwards!
17.japanese: ヴィシアを守る邪しき剣、参ります！
17.english: The blade that protects the Vichya Dominion advances!

18.chinese: 碍事的家伙已经清除了。
18.chineseTL: The troublesome individual has been dealt with.
18.japanese: 邪魔者は片付けておきました
18.english: I've eliminated those who would stand in our way.

19.chineseTL: I haven't lost... I haven't lost yet!
19.japanese: まだ負けていない……まだ……まだよ！！
19.english: I won't admit defeat... I haven't lost yet!!

22.chineseTL: ....(Le Malin appears to have fallen asleep)
22.japanese: ……（ル・マランは寝ているようだ）
22.english: ...... (Le Malin seems to have fallen asleep)

23.chinese: 维希教廷的恶毒之刃，指挥官的秘书舰，驱逐舰恶毒。请尽管吩咐
23.chineseTL: Vichia Dominion's Guardian Blade, Commander's secretary ship, Destroyer Le Malin. Please feel free to call upon me.
23.japanese: 駆逐艦ル・マラン、そなたの秘書艦にして、ヴィシアの邪しき剣。なんなりとご命令ください
23.english: Destroyer Le Malin is both your secretary and the blade that protects the Vichya Dominion. Please give me your orders.

24.chinese: 虽、虽然说尽管吩咐了…但是你给的活也太多了吧……不行了要累死了……我要请假……
24.chineseTL: E-even though I said to freely call upon me... but isn't this too much work...? I can't stand it any more.. I'm going to die of exhaustion... I about to take a furlough..
24.japanese: な、なんでもするとは言いましたけど…流石に仕事が多すぎですよ……もうだめ…疲れた……休みをください……
24.english: I, I did say that I was ready to take your orders at any time, but... there's just too much work after all...... Tired... Can't work anymore... Please let me go on leave...

25.chinese: 今、今天我很努力工作了，能不能早点下班……谢谢指挥官！看来今天能回家多睡几个小时了！…额，对不起，我有点太兴奋了
25.chineseTL: I-I've worked hard today, so could I knock off a little earlier...? Thank you, Commander! Looks like I'll be able to catch few hours more hours of sleep today! Er, sorry, I got a little excited.
25.japanese: きょ、今日は頑張って働いたから、早退しても大丈夫ですか…？や、やった！これで帰って寝られるよ！…す、すみませんはしゃぎすぎました…
25.english: I, I can go home early today because I did such a good job...? Woah... Woohoo! Now I can head back and go to sleep! ...S-sorry, I got a bit excited there...

26.chinese: 指挥官，咳咳，今天能不能……一起早点下班？啊不是累了！我的意思是今、今天能不能一起找个地方约、约会什么的……？
26.chineseTL: Commander, Ahem.. can we... knock off a little earlier together? Ah, I'm not tired! My meaning is... c-could we find a place together and go on a d-date or whatever.....?
26.japanese: 指揮官、きょ、今日は一緒にちょっと早めに上がったら……別に疲れたわけじゃありませんよ！えっと、でで、デートとかでもどうかなと、お、思いまして……
26.english: Commander, t-today, can we leave work a bit earlier? ...It's not because I'm tired! Um, I was thinking... if you wanted to go on a date or something...

27.chinese: 维希教廷的守护之刃，我、驱逐舰恶毒，保证今后将永远保护您，向您贡献我永远的爱——累、累死了………指挥官，我们能不能早点回去啊……
27.chineseTL: Vichya Dominion's guardian blade, I , Destroyer Le Malin pledge from this day onward to forever protect and share with you my eternal love —— Y-yawn... I'm exhausted... Commander, can't just go home earlier...
27.japanese: ヴィシアの剣として、私――ル・マランはこれからもずっとそなたを守り、そなたに永遠なる愛を捧げることを誓おう。……つ、疲れました…指揮官、早く帰りましょうよ……
27.english: As the blade that protects the Vichya Dominion, I, Le Malin, swear to defend you and offer you my eternal love. Um... this is really tiring... Commander, let's head back already...

28.japanese: ル・トリオンファン……おかえり

1.chinese: 指挥官，早～嗯，今天是神也要休息的日子，所以就算你把凯旋拉出来逼我干活，我也是绝对不会努力的
1.chineseTL: Good morning, Commander. Um, today is the Sabbath, so even if you got Triomphant to force me to work, I'd be absolutely lackadaisical about it!
1.japanese: 指揮官、おはよー。はい、今日は神様的にも休息日だから、トリオンファンの名前を出しても無駄ですよ。今日はゼッタイに、頑張りませんからね
1.english: Morning, Commander~ Mm, the Sabbath is the day of rest, so I shall not budge from my sacred charge even if you were to call Triomphant over. I solemnly swear to do absolutely nothing today.

2.chinese: 指挥官，早～嗯，今天是神也要休息的日子，所以就算你把凯旋拉出来逼我干活，我也是绝对不会努力的
2.chineseTL: Good morning, Commander. Um, today is the Sabbath, so even if you got Triomphant to force me to work, I'd be absolutely lackadaisical about it!
2.japanese: 指揮官、おはよー。はい、今日は神様的にも休息日だから、トリオンファンの名前を出しても無駄ですよ。今日はゼッタイに、頑張りませんからね
2.english: Morning, Commander~ Mm, the Sabbath is the day of rest, so I shall not budge from my sacred charge even if you were to call Triomphant over. I solemnly swear to do absolutely nothing today.

3.chinese: 好累…懒得动了……指挥官，有事也别叫我哈……
3.chineseTL: So sleepy.. I'm too lazy to even move.... Commander, please don't call upon me even if you have a job..
3.japanese: だるい…頑張りたくない……指揮官、用事があっても呼ばないでね……
3.english: Tired... Don't wanna work... Commander, don't call for me even if you have something that needs doing...

4.chinese: 指挥官，我把咖啡拿过来了！……怎、怎么可能……难道你看出来我偷偷往里放了会让人犯困的感冒药么！？
4.chineseTL: Commander, I've bought coffee! ....H-how... Did you see me secretly slipping in sleep inducing cold medicine!?
4.japanese: コホン！指揮官、コーヒーを持ってきました！……ま、まさか…安眠系の風邪薬をこっそり入れたのがバレたの…！？
4.english: Ahem! Commander, I brought coffee! N-no way! How'd you figure out that I slipped cold medication into it...?!

5.chinese: 啊啊今天不想干活了啦…指挥官～歇一会吧！嗯！就一会！
5.chineseTL: Ahhh, I don't feel like working anymore.. Commander~ let's take a break! Hm! Just a while!
5.japanese: もう今日は仕事したくないですよぉ…しきかーん、早く休憩しましょうよ～休憩！はい！
5.english: I don't wanna do any more work todayyy... Commander, let's hurry up and take a break already~! Right! Now!

6.chinese: 哇！？……真是的，又被指挥官给弄醒了！本来好不容易就快要睡着了的……
6.chineseTL: Wah!? ...Woken up by the Commander again! And I had finally just fallen asleep...
6.japanese: ひゃぅ！？…もう、何するんですか！せっかく寝られそうだったのに……
6.english: Hyah?! ...Jeez, what are you doing! Just when I was about to fall asleep...

7.chinese: 给你们见识下空想级的厉害！
7.chineseTL: I'll let you witness the power of the Les Fantasque!
7.japanese: ル・ファンタスク級の力をご覧あれ！
7.english: Witness the power of the Le Fantasque class!

8.chinese: 歼灭完成。……不对！我不是说了今天不加油工作的吗！
8.chineseTL: Extermination complete. No...! Didn't I say I'd be lackadaisical?
8.japanese: 殲滅、完了。……って、今日は頑張らないと言ったじゃありませんか！
8.english: Extermination complete...... Wait, didn't I say I wasn't going to do anything today?!

9.chinese: 今天看来不适合工作……早点回去休息……
9.chineseTL: Looks like today's not a suitable day for working. Let's just knock off early and get some rest.
9.japanese: 今日はやっぱり仕事ができる日じゃないのね……早く帰って休みたい…
9.english: I really can't get any work done today after all... I just want to head back and relax already...

1.chinese: 居然能找到我的秘密基地，指挥官也很能干呢……但是很遗憾，我是不会跟你回去工作的，我要……呼啊……在这里睡一整天…
1.japanese: まさか私の隠れ家を見つけるなんて、流石と言うべきですね…ですが残念です。今日はゼッタイに執務室に戻りません。ここで……はぁあ……ここでぐっすり寝させてくださぁい…
1.english: I must commend you for being able to find my secret base, Commander... but unfortunately for you, I refuse to return to the office today. Just... *yawn*...let me spend the whole day sleeping here...

2.chinese: 居然能找到我的秘密基地，指挥官也很能干呢……但是很遗憾，我是不会跟你回去工作的，我要……呼啊……在这里睡一整天…
2.japanese: まさか私の隠れ家を見つけるなんて、流石と言うべきですね…ですが残念です。今日はゼッタイに執務室に戻りません。ここで……はぁあ……ここでぐっすり寝させてくださぁい…
2.english: I must commend you for being able to find my secret base, Commander... but unfortunately for you, I refuse to return to the office today. Just... *yawn*...let me spend the whole day sleeping here...

3.japanese: しきかん…アイスぅぅぅ……

4.chinese: 唔，吊床虽然很舒服，但不能滚来滚去啊…啧，设计失误了…
4.japanese: ハンモックはぐったりはできてもゴロゴロはできませんね…不覚……
4.english: This hammock feels pretty nice, but I can't roll around... A tactical failure...

5.chinese: 指挥官为什么不能变成空调呢，那样我一定会对指挥官……Zzzzz
5.japanese: Zzz……指揮官はエアコンにはなれませんね…なれたら私は指揮官のことが……Zzz……
5.english: Too bad you can't turn into an air conditioner, Commander... Otherwise, I'd cling to you all day... Zzzzzz...

6.chinese: 呼啊……指挥官，我要睡午觉了，不准吵我，有任务也不要叫我……可乐不要喝完哦，还有薯片……唔……
6.japanese: というわけでル・マラン、これよりエレガントな昼寝に入ります。任務があっても絶対に起こさないでください……コーラとおやつは残して……Zzzzz
6.english: In any case, Le Malin will now go take a most elegant nap. Don't bother me even if there's something that needs doing... and save me some Cola and snacks... Zzzzzz...

7.chinese: 那边的难道是……可怖！？指挥官，快让我躲一下，被那个家伙找到我一天的睡觉计划就泡汤了！
7.japanese: あそこにいるのは……テリブル？！ししし指揮官早く隠れさせて！あの子に見つかったら今日一日安心して寝れないですよ！！
7.english: Who's that over there? ...Le Terrible?! C-c-c-commander! Hide me! If that girl finds me, I'm not gonna be able to sleep the day away!

8.chinese: 游泳？指挥官，不是我自夸，我就给你表演一个随波漂浮吧
8.japanese: 泳ぐ？ふふふ、自慢じゃないですけどこのル・マラン、エレガントに浮いてみせましょう
8.english: Swim? Hehehe, not to brag or anything, but I'll show you the most elegant way to float!

9.chinese: 太邋遢了？……唔，反正指挥官早就知道了……
9.japanese: だらしなさすぎって…？いいじゃないですかどうせ指揮官にはバレてますしー
9.english: I'm too slovenly...? Meh, haven't you already known that for ages~?

10.chinese: 任务？不去……有冰淇淋？我去！
10.japanese: 新しい任務です。あ、アイスでは釣られ…い、行きますよ！
10.english: A new mission? Don't wanna... Th-there's ice cream in it for me? F-fine, I'll do it!

11.chinese: 指挥官在努力工作，我却在偷懒…呼呼呼…
11.japanese: 指揮官が仕事を頑張っているのにこっちは……っっっ…
11.english: The commander's out there working hard, but here I am... Zzz...

12.chinese: 指挥官，我们赶快回去吹空调吧！
12.japanese: 指揮官…早く戻ってエアコン付けて涼しくしましょうよ…
12.english: Commander... Let's hurry back and turn on the air conditioning...

13.chinese: 好热……为什么这么热还要出击啊！
13.japanese: 暑い……こんなに暑いのになんで出撃させたんですかー！
13.english: So hot...... Why must we sortie in this kind of weather?!

14.chinese: 唔欸？要回去了吗？……什么！已经傍晚了吗！睡了一天，好累哦……糟了，没力气了，指挥官，帮帮我……
14.japanese: も、もう帰るんですかー……あ！もう夕方じゃありませんか！…っ！寝すぎて力が入らない……指揮官、た、助けて……
14.english: Eh? It's already time to go home...? Geh! It's already evening! Hmm?! I can't move my legs because I overslept... Commander, help me...
